column5: Beautiful loft in a historic building. It is part of the National Historic Artist Lofts. It is in a perfect location in downtown Galveston/The Strand which is walking distance to restauraunts, night life, festivals, art galleries, and shopping. It is 1 mile from the beach as well. There is a full kitchen, bathroom (with a bathtub/shower), living space and bedroom with high rise ceilings. It is furnished with a queen bed and kitchen table w/ chairs, but most other furniture has been removed.
column8: Beautiful Loft on the Strand & Close to the Beach
